about_the_game:
Extend the Steel Division 2 experience with this DLC RP#10, featuring a new tactical map!

Up to 20 players can fight on this brand new Tannenberg map! Tannenberg is a huge war zone with a central hub topped by three hills that will drive armies into intense battles.

This DLC is the last one of the 10 free DLCs available for all Steel Division 2 players, but, soon, a new free DLC will be released: Army General co-op.
detailed_description:
Extend the Steel Division 2 experience with this DLC RP#10, featuring a new tactical map!

Up to 20 players can fight on this brand new Tannenberg map! Tannenberg is a huge war zone with a central hub topped by three hills that will drive armies into intense battles.

This DLC is the last one of the 10 free DLCs available for all Steel Division 2 players, but, soon, a new free DLC will be released: Army General co-op.
legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: Steel Division 2 - Reinforcement Pack #10 - Tannenberg

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G4920 (Legacy: i3-2100) , AMD Athlon 200GE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 (Legacy: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450), AMD Radeon RX 460 (Legacy: ATI Radeon HD 5570)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: 4 cores Intel | AMD CPU (Intel i3-8100, AMD Ryzen 3 1200)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3 GB (Legacy: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780), AMD Radeon RX 580 (Legacy: AMD Radeon R9 290X)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Extend the Steel Division 2 experience with this DLC #10, featuring a brand new tactical map playable in 10v10!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
